page.title: 12The Cornish Gorsedd
page.content: This year the Cornish Gorsedd is to be held near Goonhavern.This will be a very important event,looked forward to with enthusiasm by both locals and visitors.The Cornish Gorsedd,although independent,is allied to those of England and Wales.The ceromonies will start with the sounding of Corn Gwlas to the four points of the compass,a symbolic call to all Cornwall.This will be followed by the Ceremony of Peace which will both open and close the Gorsedd.The Gorsedd exists to maintain the National Celtic Spirit of Cornwall,to encourage the study of Cornish history,language,art and music.There is a grand feeling of local pride in being chosen as the venue for such an important event.
